00014 #ifndef _BOARD_RECT_H_
00015 #define _BOARD_RECT_H_
00016 
00017 #include <iostream>
00018 #include "Board/Point.h"
00019 
00020 namespace LibBoard {
00021 
00026 struct Rect {
00027   
00028   double left;      
00029   double top;      
00030   double width;      
00031   double height;    
00043   Rect( double leftX = 0.0f, double topY = 0.0f, double rectWidth = 0.0f, double rectHeight = 0.0f )
00044     :left( leftX ), top( topY ), width( rectWidth ), height( rectHeight ) { } 
00045 
00046   Point topLeft() { return Point( left, top ); }
00047   Point topRight() { return Point( left + width, top ); }
00048   Point bottomLeft() { return Point( left, top - height ); }
00049   Point bottomRight() { return Point( left + width, top - height ); }
00050 };
00051 
00060 Rect operator||( const Rect & rectA, const Rect & rectB );
00061 
00070 Rect operator&&( const Rect & rectA, const Rect & rectB );
00071 
00072 
00073 } // mamespace BoardLib
00074 
00083 std::ostream & operator<<( std::ostream & out, const LibBoard::Rect & rect );
00084 
00085 #endif // _RECT_H_
